step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Now, focus on stretching your arm fully overhead, maintaining that resistance.
Great job opening your palm and fingers wide. Keep them spread!
Nicely done making a fist while inhaling and tightening. Remember to relax on the exhale.
Second rep, looking good! Continue to keep that arm extended overhead.
Great job on this rep! Keep that arm straight and feel the stretch.
Excellent! Continue to open your hand and fingers wide.
Fantastic finish! You made a strong fist while inhaling and relaxed well on the exhale. Keep visualizing that fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Opening your hand wide and making a strong fist while inhaling helps pump the lymph fluid effectively. Keep up the good work!
